name: For the Carrots!
description:
The descendent of the once-mighty Carrot Kingdom finally sets out to rescue his kin...will he be able to succeed?

Controls:

ASWD - movement in hub

SW - movement in level

E - pickup

R - go through

RMB - shoot/attack

Esc - pause menu

This game was made for Godot Wild Jam #34. It was my second ever entry and made entirely by me, except for a few sound effects.
